title.en: The Quintessence of Oceanic Prayers of Aspiration

text.en: Your enlightened body was formed through the splendour of twofold accumulation beyond measure;
text.en-trans: drang yé tsok zung pal gyi trünpé ku

text.en: Your enlightened speech, the melody of Brahmā, has sixty aspects;
text.en-trans: yenlak drukchu denpa tsang yang sung

text.en: And your enlightened mind is perfectly replete with the qualities of the ten powers—
text.en-trans: tob chü yönten künné dzokpé tuk

text.en: Mighty Sage, supreme deity of deities, turn your attention towards me, I pray.
text.en-trans: tubwang lha yi lha chok gong su sol

text.en: Just as you embraced with intense care and compassion
text.en-trans: dukngal sum gyi ché cher narwé tsok

text.en: The multitudes tormented by the three types of suffering,1
text.en-trans: gang gi tsé chen tukjé nyewar zung

text.en: And set your mind on supreme and unsurpassed awakening,
text.en-trans: dön nyi döpa yizhin jowé chir

text.en: In order to fulfil the twin aims and wishes of yourself and others,
text.en-trans: lamé changchub chok tu tukkyé tar

text.en: May I too remain untempted by the allure of selfish peace and bliss,
text.en-trans: dak kyang khanyam dro kün matong bar

text.en: And, until all beings, who are as innumerable as space is vast, are freed,
text.en-trans: rangdön zhidé pal la mi chakpar

text.en: Rely on the adornment of altruistic concern and beneficial conduct.
text.en-trans: zhenpen lhakpé sam chö gyen zhin ten

text.en: In all my lives, as I willingly enter the citadel of conditioned existence,
text.en-trans: jukpar ja o sipé drongkhyer la

text.en: May I be cared for and joyfully accepted by the sole father of all,
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu yab chik khyenpé ter

text.en: That veritable treasury of wisdom, heroic Mañjuśrī,
text.en-trans: jampal pawö gyé zhin jesu zung

text.en: And may I perfect the oceanic conduct of the bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpö mönlam lé tenpé

text.en: As revealed in Samantabhadra's prayer of aspiration.
text.en-trans: changchub chöpa gyatso tarchin shok

text.en: In future, when nine hundred and ninety-six great guides
text.en-trans: ma ong namdren gugya guchu druk

text.en: Display the attainment of awakening in this very realm,
text.en-trans: zhing dir ngön tsanggyawé tsul tön tsé

text.en: May I serve them constantly as the best of their attendants,
text.en-trans: taktu zhab drang nyer né chok tu gyur

text.en: And gain the power to contribute to their magnificent activity.
text.en-trans: lab chen trinlé pelwé tu tob shok

text.en: May all beings with whom I am connected, through actions good or bad,
text.en-trans: zang ngen lé kyi drelwé semchen nam

text.en: Take birth, as soon as they depart this life, in the realm of Great Bliss,
text.en-trans: tsé di pö tsé dechen zhing du kyé

text.en: There to receive prophecy from Ablaze with Myriad Tokens of Light2
text.en-trans: ö tsen tong bar sung gi lungten tob

text.en: And fulfil their enormous potential for knowledge, love and strength.
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pé tsal chen dzokpar shok

text.en: May the faultless teachings of Buddha flourish and endure,
text.en-trans: drimé gyalten dar zhing yündu né

text.en: And all beings without exception enjoy the splendour of benefit and happiness.
text.en-trans: rimé dro nam pendé pal gyi tso

text.en: This, and only this, is my constant aspiration—
text.en-trans: dü kün yi la mönpa di khona

text.en: Assure me, here and now, that it all will be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: tün gyur sung gi ukyung dengdir tsol

text.en: May auspiciousness ripen as a treasure of fourfold abundance,3
text.en-trans: tashi gangzhik püntsok dé zhi ter

text.en: Healing nourishment for all living beings without exception.
text.en-trans: malü kyegü nyer tsö sö su min

text.en: And may ills and misfortune be forever entirely unknown,
text.en-trans: mi shi güpa tsal kyang mi nyepé

text.en: As the light of virtue and excellence fills the three domains.
text.en-trans: gelek nangwé sa sum khyabpar shok
